description: This rustic potato salad recipe features pickled red onion, punchy capers and a creamy yoghurt dressing. Why not serve it at your next alfresco feast?
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Dec 2021,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Potato Salad With Pickled Red Onion & Herbs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a large, deep saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat, then reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until just tender. Drain, then transfer to a large bowl. Set aside to cool completely. Cut into 2cm-thick slices and place in a large bowl.

Meanwhile, place vinegar and sugar in a small bowl and stir until sugar has dissolved. Add onion and stir until combined. Set aside for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, to pickle. Combine yoghurt, mustard and chopped herbs in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add capers and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes or until crisp. Remove capers with a slotted spoon and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Add yoghurt dressing to potatoes, gently stirring to coat. Arrange potatoes, drained pickled onion and rocket in a bowl. Serve topped with extra herbs and capers.
